text: The ominous rivers and mysterious tree's are no rare sight for the exploring Sea-Maiden of the Graeling.
The Graeling are known for their ruthless raids and pillages, usually launched from their impressive fleet of longships.
hildr's skill to traverse difficult jungle terrain has proven her a valueable asset for many of explorer, be it Norscan or Dwarven.
A keen sight is both helpful when exploring as it is when taking aim.
Inked with the poisonous blood of slain skinks, hildr's arrows are as colourful as they are deadly.
Few know they're way around a mast and oar as hildr, Sea-Maiden of the Graeling.
There are not many who have Harald Whyrlas's ear, yet hildr is considered champion among Graeling.
The Sea-Maiden harnesses her skill and can bring down any monster, no matter the terrain.
As she blows the Graeling horn hunters gather for their feast: The Hunt.
Hildr is a rarity, a female reaver. She is a beauty, with long blonde hair and a feminine figure that belies her strength.
Hildr is a rarity, a female reaver. She enjoys challenging the most stalwart opponents on the battlefield to single combat.
Hildr will join you after the supporter race is over
